title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Fundamentals of Protein-Small Molecule Interaction Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental principles of protein-small molecule interactions and present three or more applied case studies
Visualize and analyze 3D structural models of protein-small molecule complexes using mobile tools
Predict various structural variants of protein-small molecule interactions by applying probabilistic modeling techniques

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
